title: Box Volume Optimizer
description: Interactive simulation demonstrating the classic calculus optimization problem of maximizing box volume from a cardboard sheet. Features 2D template view, 3D box visualization, and volume function graph with real-time updates.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Optimization
Volume
Derivatives
Critical Points
Applied Mathematics

controls.name: Cut Size (x)
controls.description: Controls the size of squares cut from each corner

controls.name: Animate Fold
controls.description: Shows animation of flat cardboard folding into 3D box

controls.name: Show Optimal
controls.description: Jumps to the cut size that maximizes volume

controls.name: Reset
controls.description: Resets cut size to default value
